All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable
public class ToggleButtonPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel

This widget displays a group of radio buttons in a tabular layout.

See Also:

Constructor Detail

ToggleButtonPanel

public ToggleButtonPanel(java.lang.String[] names,
                         int nrows,
                         int ncols,
                         boolean enableMultipleSelection,
                         int hgap,
                         int vgap)
Create a panel containing toggle buttons, arranged in the given number of rows and columns.
Parameters:
names - an array of ToggleButton labels
nrows - the number of rows
nrows - the number of columns
enableMultipleSelection - if true, multiple buttons may be selected, otherwise only one
hgap - the horizontal gap
vgap - the vertical gap

ToggleButtonPanel

public ToggleButtonPanel(java.lang.String[] names,
                         int nrows,
                         int ncols,
                         boolean enableMultipleSelection)
Create a panel containing toggle buttons, arranged in the given number of rows and columns.
Parameters:
names - an array of ToggleButton labels
nrows - the number of rows
nrows - the number of columns
enableMultipleSelection - if true, multiple buttons may be selected, otherwise only one
Method Detail

addItemListener

public void addItemListener(java.awt.event.ItemListener l)
Register to receive item events from this object whenever the selected item changes. If enableMultipleSelection is true, the listener method is called whenever a button state changes, otherwise only when a button is selected.

removeItemListener

public void removeItemListener(java.awt.event.ItemListener l)
Stop receiving item events from this object.

fireItemEvent

Notify any item listeners that the selection changed.
